intro: Legitimate dorky motherfucker. Seeking collaborators on hybridized p2p/decentralized+clearnet youtube replacement

post.body: What's going on all my fellow nerds and nerdettes?  Looks like this whole network is deader than a graveyard, let alone this site.  Makes me sad.  Lots of potential here.

comment.body: @Krixano: looks like I've raised a few people from the darkness around here at least.  thanks for the link :)  I suppose I can't be complaining, really, when I've still yet to manage putting in the effort necessary to port over (at minimum) a few of my more entertainment-based/user friendly personal project sites to a zeronet version.  anyone have any requests, for anything that's missing a zeronet equivalent, perhaps?
keep fighting the good fight, my friends :)
you're being followed, fucker.  tag, you're it (and you have cooties)
